### New Functions (dojo-functions.js)

```javascript
/**
 * Get random quote based on context
 */
function getQuote(context, mode = 'adaptive') {
  const quotes = {
    startup: [...cobraQuotes.startup, ...miyagiQuotes.startup],
    victory: [...cobraQuotes.victory, ...miyagiQuotes.victory],
    defeat: [...cobraQuotes.defeat, ...miyagiQuotes.defeat],
    strike: [...cobraQuotes.strike, ...miyagiQuotes.strike],
    patrol: [...cobraQuotes.patrol, ...miyagiQuotes.patrol],
    wisdom: [...miyagiQuotes.wisdom]
  };
  
  // Mode filtering
  let pool = quotes[context] || quotes.startup;
  
  if (mode === 'cobra') {
    pool = pool.filter(q => q.type === 'cobra');
  } else if (mode === 'miyagi') {
    pool = pool.filter(q => q.type === 'miyagi');
  } else if (mode === 'adaptive') {
    // Use current mode (cobraclaw config)
    pool = config.sensei.mode === 'Kreese' 
      ? pool.filter(q => q.type === 'cobra')
      : pool;
  }
  
  return pool[Math.floor(Math.random() * pool.length)];
}

 */

/**
 * Context-specific quote functions
 */
function startupQuote() { return injectQuote('startup'); }
function victoryQuote() { return injectQuote('victory'); }
function defeatQuote() { return injectQuote('defeat'); }
function patrolQuote() { return injectQuote('patrol'); }
function miyagiWisdom() { return injectQuote('wisdom', 'miyagi'); }

/**
 * Custom quote addition
 */
function addQuote(category, text, type = 'cobra') {
  const newQuote = { text, type, category, added: new Date().toISOString() };
  quotes[category].push(newQuote);
  return `Quote added to ${category}: "${text.substring(0, 30)}..."`;
}
```
